account_id.description: Your Stripe account ID (starts with acct_). Find yours here: https://go.estuary.dev/t7DgTg
account_id.title: Account ID

client_secret.description: Stripe API key (usually starts with sk_live_). Find yours here: https://go.estuary.dev/t7DgTg
client_secret.title: Secret Key

lookback_window_days.description: When set, the connector will always re-export data from the past N days, where N is the value set here. This is useful if your data is frequently updated after creation. More info here https://go.estuary.dev/OhUbgL
lookback_window_days.title: Lookback Window in days

slice_range.description: The time increment used by the connector when requesting data from the Stripe API. The bigger the value is, the less requests will be made and faster the sync will be. On the other hand, the more seldom the state is persisted.
slice_range.title: Data request time increment in days

start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Only data generated after this date will be replicated.
start_date.title: Replication start date
